name: Fire Mage with a Goatee
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Click to shoot

Goal:

Beat the boss after getting as many coins as you can!

Story:

You're a proud wizard who only knows the fireball spell. To prove the power of the spell to your fellow mages, you decided to embark on a perilous quest through a cave to destroy an evil cyclops who is trying to escape!
